title: What are SMART boards used for? - Quora

response.answer_text: They help to display information of all sorts. Sort of like a black board, chalk, and eraser. I’m certain they will catch on in Wealthy schools and colleges. They will probably be purchased and used in communities where it is more important to know how to throw a ball than understand any academic subject. Today’s students can ignore education in any technology. Businesses have had them stored away in dusty closets for decades. They are nothing new! The primary difference between a football player and a football, is about 6 IQ points.
